%% Auto-generated divider pages
\ifincludepublications
    \cleardoublepage
    \fancyhead{} % Clear headers for divider section
    \part{Included publications}
    \cleardoublepage
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% set up macros for BibTeX - if necessary

\ifbiblatex
\relax
\else
\makeatletter
% Disable the back reference
%\renewcommand*{\backref}[1]{}
%\renewcommand*{\backrefalt}[4]{}
\newcommand*{\backref}[1]{}
\newcommand*{\backrefalt}[4]{}

% No special openbib formatting
\let\@openbib@code\@empty % see https://www.latex-project.org/help/documentation/classes.pdf

% Turn off item's biblabel
\renewcommand\@biblabel[1]{}

% Redefine the thebibliography to format as we want
\renewenvironment{thebibliography}[1]
{\list{}%
   {\leftmargin0pt \usecounter{enumiv}}%
\sloppy
\clubpenalty4000
\@clubpenalty \clubpenalty
\widowpenalty4000%
\sfcode`\.\@m}
{\def\@noitemerr
{\@latex@warning{Empty `thebibliography' environment}}%
\endlist}
\makeatother
\fi % end of ifbiblatex
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% Make a file to put the cited information into
\FileOpen{citedtagsfile}{citedtags.bib}

\makeatletter
\newcommand\removebibheader{\let\bib@heading\relax}
\makeatother
% Divider for paper:A
\thispagestyle{empty}
\begin{dividerContent}{0cm}{5cm}
\myfancytab[RIGHT]{\ref*{paper:A}}{1}{ioannidis_coherent_1991}{Included_publications/rfc1235.txt}

The authors granted IETF Trust and the IETF the non-exclusive right to publish the document as an RFC. All other rights are retained by the authors.
\end{dividerContent}
\cleardoublepage
\includepdf[pages={1-2},scale=1.0]{Included_publications/rfc1235.txt.pdf}
\cleardoublepage

\begin{dividerContent}{0cm}{5cm}

This publication has a \href{https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/}{CC BY 3.0 license - Attribution 3.0 Unported}.
\end{dividerContent}
\cleardoublepage
\includepdf[pages={1-},scale=1.0]{Included_publications/Paper_B_one_page.pdf}
\cleardoublepage
